# This file defines the lectures for the class.  The syllabus is
# automatically generated from this file.

# Date:  [Lecture type]
#        blank:  normal lecture
#        noclass [explanation text]
#        exam    [exam name]
# I:  Instructor   (overrides the global INSTRUCTOR)
# T:  Title
# S:  slides ref (looks in lectures/<name>.{ppt,pdf,ps,html}
# V:  Video list (links to coursecast)
# R:  Readings (copied verbatim)
# N:  Notes (copied verbatim)
# A:  Topic Area (generates a heading)
# RB: BibTeX ref::URL

CLASS: 'CS 6250: Internetworking Architectures and Protocols'
CLASS_SHORT: CS6250
SUMMARY: CS 6250
YEAR:  2011
TERM:  Fall
INSTRUCTOR:  Nick Feamster
LOCATION:  Howey L1
START_TIME: '12:05'
END_TIME: '13:25'
READINGBASE:  http://www.gtnoise.net/papers/library
ALTERNATE: week
HEADSPAN: 5
SHOW_LECNUM: yes
SHOW_INSTRUCTOR: no
HIGHLIGHT_DUE: yes

LECTURES:

- 'Introduction and Overview'

- 8/23:
        T: 'Introduction/Overview'
        RB: Design::clark-darpa.pdf Clark:Architecture::clark-architecture.pdf
        N: '<a href="http://www.sigcomm.org/ccr/drupal/files/p83-keshavA.pdf">Keshav</a>'
        S: CourseIntro

        T: 'The Host (Naming and Addressing)'

        RB: Kohler::kohler-click.pdf Partridge::partridge-50gbps.pdf
        S: DataPlane

        N: '<a href="http://www.openflowswitch.org/">OpenFlow</a>'

- 'Transit Networks'

- 9/15:
        T: 'Naming Security (not covered)'
